samplePrompts: Write a short story about a robot learning to paint.
Explain quantum computing in simple terms.
Tell me a fascinating fact about space exploration.
What are the benefits of renewable energy?
What makes a good user interface design?
sampleTexts: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. This is a sample text for testing our text-to-speech system. It includes multiple sentences to demonstrate sentence highlighting.
Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing the way we interact with technology. From voice assistants to autonomous vehicles, AI is becoming an integral part of our daily lives.
Climate change is one of the most pressing challenges of our time. It requires global cooperation and innovative solutions to address its far-reaching impacts on our planet.
The human brain contains approximately 86 billion neurons, each connected to thousands of others. This incredible network enables consciousness, memory, and creativity.

llm.description: Small instruction-tuned language model optimized for browser deployment
